replies.body: Are we going to fix the client at some point?
I wish so, these bugs are atrocious honestly... Especially the fact we cant see our friends icons??? Love how THAT bug got from PBE...
used to be a small group that got messed up clients, now its almost everyone so i hope riot doesnt keep ignoring it.
Used to be that the old client would have 1-2 bugs per year. New client has at least 2 a week, and Riot never addresses them
Riot: "If we don't address the client as a problem, it's not a problem... right..?"

Got a new bug where the string responsible for our identification regardless of our names and regions is displayed and not the summoner name.

The client is being held together with spit and wishful thinking.
How about fixing the Friends List? Everything is all scrambled and folders aren't working.

I know Ya'll are going on Holiday Break (which reminds me, Hope you guys have a Merry Christmas/Happy New Year), but is anyone going to address the issues with the Client?

It's becoming quite a frequent problem as **_More & More_** players are noticing something is definitely wrong with the Client. There are times on my end where I will have a perfect connection to the internet, yet the client will Lag so severely that it will become unresponsive (One time it flat out refused to let me play as it would lag out after pressing 'Accept Match' during Queue). There's also a bug at the Post-Game Screen that I have noticed where as soon as you join the post-game lobby, it will say that all players (including myself) have left the lobby. Other players have stated that the Friends list is also bugged as well.

I'm not expecting the Client to be fixed overnight, but I don't think I've seen any official responses from anyone so far since all this trouble started.
If someone can atleast address it and let us know that you guys are looking into it, that'd be nice.
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/5/51/Everything_is_Okay_Emote.png/revision/latest?cb=20180322145328
Sooo is the framerate drops bug fixed or will it have to wait for next year?
If you're using blitz.gg, just uninstall that garbage, nearly doubled my framerate when I did lol

How detatched are you guys from the game that you think AD Shaco needs to be nerfed, by all means nerf AP Shaco! But AD is actually in quite a rough spot atm, for sure heavily underperforming compared to AP.

https://u.gg/lol/champions/shaco/build

53% WR Plat+.... you good bud?

you do realize that that number is taking into account bot AD and AP shacos right? That does nothing to prove for or against specifically AD or AP shaco, but rather that Shaco might need nerfs that hit both.

Core build (AKA most taken)
Zerkers - Duskblade - Ghostblade
56.91% Win Rate

Is this AP? Damn... thats really weird, must have forgot to read the patch notes, sorry bout that man!


https://gyazo.com/befc7020987e71924dcc330036a87434

If you even bothered to look at what I said. He needed an AP nerf, but AD did not need a nerf. Either you're blatantly stupid (I mean you pulled up a winrate without any argument so you clearly are) or you are a bias person.

What argument is there to be had? 

The data literally points to him needing to be nerfed. What else do you want? LOL
This guy still doesn’t understand his most taken build is AD LOL
Fix the fucking client and remove Aphelios. In that order. That is all.
FIX YOUR CLIENT DOGS
no nerfs to morde?
Right? That champ is absolutely infuriating to lane against rn, just permabanning him until he gets the nerfs he deserves.
can we plz nerf {{champion:89}} and {{champion:111}} , they 1v1 adcs early
Whats the problem with a melee champion 1v1ing a scaling ranged champion early?
I'd say there'd be a problem if they couldn't
Hey look random Heim nerfs
random? he's been a top tier botlane for how long now??

The community hates me for telling the truth, but I’ll say it as many times as need be. Riots balance team......what in the entire world were you thinking  when making Aphelios? I shouldn’t be struggling as a JUNGLER to take an adc down at close corners when my bot and the enemy bot are on par with each other. I also should be expecting an adc WITH 5 GUNS TO be DECENTLY weaker than normal since he can use each weapon and ability to his advantage more than any normal champion. When slightly ahead in game he does about 1/3rd of my HEALTH in a single shot. I’m not sure if that’s an ability or basic attack but either way that’s just not balanced in my opinion. Don’t even get me started on how scared I am for Sett. At this point, top is a mess and broken champions need to be scaled down to normal champions. After the Morde rework incident i will forever be on edge with new champions no matter how “balanced” you claim them to be. My advice for you Riot? Make the game balanced so I don’t regret spending, and possibly don’t think about quitting the game.

The argument that just because you’re a Jungler (a position with almost every role: tanks, bruisers, assassins, at least one support (Ivern), mages, and marksmen), you should automatically be able to 1v1 an adc already made me hesitant to read the rest of your comment.  The audacity of a no-name and unknowledgeable gamer giving condescending advice to Riot... and the fact that you don’t even bother to take a minute to research what the champion does before complaining is unbelievable.  You literally don’t even know what you’re complaining about.
When we nerfing {{champion:8}} ????????????
{{item:3123}} {{item:3165}} {{item:3075}}  ... I have spoken.
To be fair, Thornmail does almost nothing against Vlad if the Vlad player has more than two neurons. Still, I agree that he's not OP.
No one’s complaining about Diana? : (

I would most definitely enjoy seeing the actual client getting some huge bug fixes. Honestly there is something wrong with it, on several occasions for most of the people I play with,  the client will freeze and nothing will respond. Usernames will display being in game whilst they arent in game,  client breaking and not opening the actual game and being stuck in loading screen etc.

As a gnar player I am super excited to see mega gnar do a bit more damage. I'm actually surprised with the balancing on these last couple of patches. I just wish they could do something about the adcs we dont get to see that often in the lower elos specifically kogmaw and kalista and maybe twitch
At least they are not buffing Mini gnar. God i hate him.
Mega gnar does need more dmg. However that ridiculous passive he has that does a good portion of an enemies hp as dmg on every 4th hit is broken, more so for tanks.

"Rek’sai is a bit on the high end stat-wise while having such a powerful ability, so we’re pulling some power out from *his* base stats."

Nice, TFT patch note creators don't know about our queen
Umm, this isn't TFT
the OP is complaining about them misgendering Rek Sai, it doesn't matter if its TFT or not lol. Still Riot.
*Cries in Sejuani*
Just revert her rework honestly, that would be amazing.
You gonna address the Yuumi buffs that dropped her winrate by 8%?
FIZZ NERFS WHEN?
What about Soul Reaver Draven skin?? Half his abilities are invisible, how is that fair to play against? It’s like a pay to win skin almost...
the client has been very buggy for like almost 3 patches now  =/

snap my choker

Does the static shyv slow now? Because everyone ive fought with an energized item seems to slow for some reason but it isnt stated on the item. Also their runes didnt have anything that could slow so im a little confused.
Did they build a Stormrazor? {{item:3095}}

As an Udyr jg main I disagree that lethality needs buffed.  As a melee champ with no gap closer (esp. after jg nerfs), about the only option we have anymore to even 1v1 is a serious outplay or bush cheese.  We are so reliant on our laners it's almost not even a fun role anymore (in fact, I would say that the only reason I still play jg is that it is the only place where I feel comfortable, because it's the only role where I have experience).  In s7, it was quite possible for me to carry games as Udyr jg - when I was just learning the champ.  I now have 2.5 million XP on him, and I can't remember the last time I "carried" a game.  I can go Cinderhulk straight into Frozen Heart + ninja tabi, have no damage in an effort to be tanky, yet get 100-0 in all of a second by a 2 kill Talon or Zed with one completed item and a second dirk, with zero outplay potential.  I feel the same about items like void staff.  You shouldn't be able to buy ONE item (a damage item no less) that SIGNIFICANTLY negates ALL the items I bought, that I sacrificed damage to get.  And you certainly shouldn't still be practically one-shotting me every time I get within sight of you, because my laner fed you two kills before I could finish my third camp + items and ranged champs are already all working to be not in my favor.  Every champ has CC, damage, goes into a wall, into the ground, into your body, gets a shield, and heals on like every damn ability.  Udyr gets a tiger dot.  He can run fast for a couple seconds, he can produce a small shield.  I'm not saying make Udyr stronger.  But maybe buff more items for melee champs, or nerf items when used against melee champs.  Something.
